data.expected: The lightness value of the hex code #79c906 is 41%.
data.sampled:
#79c906 (hex) represents a medium (#1) and the lightness value of this on the HSL color wheel is 51%. So, #39cff0 would become #79c9c1 if we were to convert it to HSL. #79c9c1 (hex) represents a light medium, light (63%) and the lightness is 64%, which is 51%, #79c9c1c. Therefore, hex code #39cff0 becomes hex code #79c9c1c.
